content: सौभाग्यं [सुभगायाः सुभगस्य वा भावः ष्यञ् द्विपदवृद्धिः] {@--1@} Good fortune or luck, fortunateness (chiefly consisting in a man's and woman's securing the favour and firm devotion of each other); प्रियेषु सौभाग्यफला हि चारुता <ls>Ku. 5. 1</ls>; सौभाग्यं ते सुभग विरहावस्थया व्यंजयंती <ls>Me. 29</ls>; (see <ls>Malli.</ls>'s remarks on सौभाग्य in both places); युज्यत आत्मनः सौभाग्यं प्रच्छादयितुं <ls>V. 2.</ls> {@--2@} Blessedness, auspiciousness. {@--3@} Beauty, charm, grace; (यस्य) हिमं न सौभाग्यविलोपि जातं <ls>Ku. 1. 3</ls>; <ls n="Ku.">2. 53</ls>, <ls n="Ku.">5. 49</ls>; <ls>R. 18. 19</ls>, <ls>U. 6. 27.</ls> {@--4@} Grandeur, sublimity. {@--5@} The auspicious state of wifehood (<ab>opp.</ab> widowhood). {@--6@} Congratulation; good wishes. {@--7@} Affection, favour. {@--8@} Red-lead. {@--9@} Borax.
